price: 55. Dus toen zij Ons kwaad maakten, straften Wij hen en verdronken hen allen.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: falammā āsafūnā intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum ajmaʿīna
